title: [Health] A study of 954 men in the Boston area (average age 69) between 1995 and 2021 found an association between experiencing short-term air pollution and cognitive performance. However, users of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (like aspirin) faired better, indicating more research is needed.

[Cancer] Northwestern U's novel gene-silencing RNA drug shows promise in glioblastoma - Medicine made with real gold nanoparticle cores which can cross the blood-brain barrier to help deliver siRNA to treat brain cancer
